thread.title: Collins Barrow Ottawa Sponsors Three Post-secondary Scholarships
thread.title_full: Collins Barrow Ottawa Sponsors Three Post-secondary Scholarships

author: Abigail Gamble
title: Collins Barrow Ottawa Sponsors Three Post-secondary Scholarships
text:
A long-time partner of the Women's Business Network (WBN), Collins Barrow Ottawa is proud to help them support three post-secondary scholarships. Recognizing scholastic and leadership achievement, the WBN offers annual scholarships for female students at the University of Ottawa, Carleton University, and Algonquin College. The three scholarships will now also be sponsored by Collins Barrow Ottawa.
“We are excited to support exceptional female students, encouraging them to develop their educational and career goals,” said Collins Barrow Ottawa partner Rosa Maria Iuliano. “We also recently created an endowment scholarship of our own with Algonquin College. Hopefully, these four scholarships will help the next generation of community leaders draw the greatest value from their educational experience.”
For more information:
